SELECT safehat.*,employee_out.*,haulemployeeout.thirdScore,haulemployeeout.empType FROM safehat LEFT JOIN employee_out ON safehat.userIdCard = employee_out.idCode LEFT JOIN haulemployeeout ON safehat.safeHatNum = haulemployeeout.safeHatNum
and NAME like '%${userName}%'
and safehat.safeHatNum like '%${safeHatNum}%'
and idCode like '%${idCard}%'
